# Specification.Monitor&lt;T&gt; method

Invokes the specified monitor with the given event.

```csharp
public static void Monitor<T>(Event e)
    where T : Monitor
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of the monitor. |
| e | Event to send to the monitor. |
